title: Anybody know why the pbe singup page is down
body:
I was wondering has anybody else tried to sing up for pbe but the site is down. when i try to enter the site it loads for 30 seconds then goes to error 500. 


{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body: Been seeing this posted a few times, and we'd like to investigate further.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can check things out.  We'll reply back asap!

Knowing the support team, asap is a strong word

######I know the support team tries as hard as they can and gets a lot of tickets tho ;v;
